00021 class SmallestRoutingCostTable {
00022 public:
00028    inline const RoutingCosts* getCosts(uint32 fromMapID, uint32 toMapID) const;

00042

00049    typedef map<pair<uint32,uint32>, RoutingCosts> costMap;

00052    costMap m_costMap;

00055 
00056 inline const RoutingCosts*
00057 SmallestRoutingCostTable::getCosts(uint32 fromMapID, uint32 toMapID) const
00058 {
00059    costMap::const_iterator it = m_costMap.find(make_pair(fromMapID, toMapID));
00060    if ( it == m_costMap.end() ) {
00061       return NULL;
00062    } else {
00063       return &(it->second);
00064    }
00065 }
00066 
00067 inline void
00068 SmallestRoutingCostTable::setCosts(uint32 fromMapID,
00069                                    uint32 toMapID,
00070                                    const RoutingCosts& costs)
00071 {
00072    m_costMap[make_pair(fromMapID, toMapID)] = costs;
00073 }
